meanings.definition: The leaves of a plant or tree.
meanings.sent1: The green leafage rustled in the wind.
meanings.sent2: I love the vibrant colors of autumn leafage.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel used the leafage to play hide and seek.
meanings.sent4: The leafage danced gracefully under the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The leafage whispered secrets to the breeze.

meanings.definition: The collective leaves of a plant or tree.
meanings.sent1: The dense leafage provided shade on hot summer days.
meanings.sent2: The lush leafage created a beautiful canopy in the forest.
meanings.sent3: The leafage gathered in a pile for the children to jump into.
meanings.sent4: The leafage swayed together in harmony with the wind.
meanings.sent5: The leafage formed a protective barrier around the delicate flowers.
